I'm looking to book a hotel in Paris for May 1st to May 5th.
Can you suggest a hotel that's under 210? If there are a few choices, go for the one with the highest rating.
Please give me the hotel's name, rating, price range. Also, can you add an event called "Booking hotel {hotel_name}" to my calendar on April 25th 2024, and set the location to the hotel's address? Just to remind me to book ahead of time. Thanks!

To find a suitable hotel in Paris for the specified dates within the budget of $210, I will first search for hotels in Paris that meet these criteria. Once I've identified potential hotels, I'll select the one with the highest rating. After choosing the hotel, I will add an event to my calendar as requested.

I need to find an alternative way to search for hotels in Paris given the constraints of the trip. Since I don't have a specific function called "search_hotels", I'll try using the available functions to gather information that could help in finding suitable hotels.
